## BrowserHashProvider.createSha256Normalizer() method

Create an MD5 normalizer using browser crypto (via SHA-256 as MD5 is not available in Web Crypto). Note: This uses SHA-256 instead of MD5 for better security and browser compatibility.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createSha256Normalizer(): BrowserHashingNormalizer;
```
**Returns:**

[BrowserHashingNormalizer](./ts-web-extras.browserhashingnormalizer.md)

A hashing normalizer using SHA-256
